Room.Name: Dwarven Dignitary's Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Drowlin's quaters, the dwarven dignitary from Tragular.
Room.LongDescription: Drowlin spends time traveling between Tragular and Kista so he's not always in town. He usually shows up every two or three days depending on the condition of the roads. Tragular is a large dwarven city deep within the mountains to the south. The quarters are rather nicely decorated with lots of gold and metals around, displaying some artifacts of Drowlin's heritage.
